TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A disease in which malignant (cancer) cells are found in the part of the urethra (the tube through which urine leaves the body) that connects to the bladder (the organ that stores urine).

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "posterior urethral cancer"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "cáncer posterior de uretra"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Enfermedad en la cual se encuentran células malignas (cancerosas) en la parte de la uretra (el tubo a través del que la orina deja el cuerpo) que se conecta con la vejiga (el órgano que almacena la orina).
